CREATE TABLE instruments ( id integer generated by default as identity NOT NULL, figi text unique NOT NULL, isin text NOT NULL, trading_status text, trading_status_md text, updated_at timestamp with time zone DEFAULT now() NOT NULL, instrument_type text, api_trade_flag text, instrument_status text, otc_flag text, exchange text, PRIMARY KEY (id) );
ALTER TABLE instruments OWNER TO postgres;
